summary: The Queen of Sheba is a famous figure from ancient times, first mentioned in the Hebrew Bible. She is known for visiting King Solomon and bringing him valuable gifts. Her story has been expanded upon in Jewish, Islamic, and Ethiopian traditions, with many legends surrounding her. Historians believe her kingdom was in modern-day Yemen, but some debate if she was a real person. Despite extensive archaeological research, no concrete evidence of her existence has been discovered.
title: Queen of Sheba
